name: Barbie Dance Party
description:
GET READY TO PARTY WITH BARBIE IN THIS 1st X-STATION RELEASE!!!

<p>
</p><p>
</p>Barbie dance party is a music rhythm style game where you must
select 3 out of 10 songs to score points by tapping to the beat
of the music. You score points for each beat you tap. Like Dance
Dance Revolution. After 3 songs you get a final score and a rank.
The higher your score is the higher your rank will be.
Features 10 songs by 90's girl bands and singers
Brittney Spears, The Spice Girls, Jennifer Lopez, and Mandy Moore.
A music player mode where you can just relax and listen to the
music.
An XBOX controller is required to play this game.
Left Down Y and B buttons = tap
LT Button = End The Game
RT Button = Reset The Game
